def has_switch(bathroom: item):
    symbol switch_exists = exists s: item : has_switch(s) and inside(s, bathroom)
    return switch_exists

behavior find_switch_in_bathroom(switch: item):
    body:
        achieve visited(switch)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom) and id[bathroom] == 1

        if has_switch(bathroom):
            bind switch: item where:
                has_switch(switch) and inside(switch, bathroom)
            achieve close_char(char, switch)
            find_switch_in_bathroom(switch)
        else:
            foreach item: item:
                if has_switch(item) and inside(item, bathroom):
                    observe(item, "Determine if this item has a switch")
                    find_switch_in_bathroom(item)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom_switch: item where:
            is_light(bathroom_switch) and not visited(bathroom_switch)
        observe(bathroom_switch,"Check if this is the light switch in the bathroom")
